Pine A Next Generation Feed Reader.

The web is full of great stuff to read, watch, and listen to, and Pine helps you find and follow it all. Pine is an Feed Reader, but it's also much more.

Follow the news you trust, right from the source.
Whether it's a Youtube channel, a blog, or a news publication you can stay up to date with it all.

Post to your site.
Pine integrates with Wordpress, so you can post to your own site from Pine and your posts will show up in your timeline. With Pine, unlike most social networks, you're in control of your content.

Save posts as favorites
Keep track of interesting posts from anyone you follow.

Discover new sites and help others do the same.
Pine's index of sites is constantly growing, and if you follow a new site, you can add it to the index and share it with other Pine users.

Use Pine from anywhere.
Pine is available from the Web, or from the iPhone and iPad app.

Pine is...

Simple.
If you follow someone, you'll see their every post, in order, period.

Private.
Your data is yours. Pine won't sell your data to anyone, and I only ask for the data I absolutely need.

Sustainable.
Pine is supported directly by its users. I build, maintain, and improve Pine so that users, like you, want to use it and keep it running. There's no ads, no trackers, and no bullshit.

Need more details? Check out the full list of features you'll get access to a a Pine premium user.

Get Started with Pine for $5/month
Have a blog, microblog, or photoblog?
Add it to our search results and get new followers, for free!

If you don't see your site in Pine's search results, you can easily add it! Simply sign up for free and submit your site. We'll periodically check in with your site to keep our results updated and let you know how many subscribers you have.

Search for new people to follow
No account needed!

Even if you don't use Pine as your feed reader, you can still search for new stuff to follow. Pine's search engine is open to everyone!

If you're a developer there's even a free search API so you can integrate Pine's search in your app or service too.
